projects.title: Project Zukes
projects.bodyText:
A multiplayer co-op survival horror game developed using Unreal Engine 5.
 - All 3D Models including the character rig and animations are created using Blender 4.0.
 - Implemented network replication for seamless multiplayer experiences.
 - Designed procedural generation systems to create varied and dynamic dungeons.

projects.title: Deep Insomnia
projects.bodyText:
A single player horror game developed with Unreal Engine 5.
 - Inspiration was taken from legendary titles such as 'Slenderman' and 'Outlast', putting emphasis on level and sound design to create an eery, captivating horror enviornment.
 - The player must explore, survive, and discover the mysteries of the void at which they spawn in.

projects.title: Project Quarantine
projects.bodyText:
An arcade shooter game where you play as a robot tank and must shoot your way through waves of enemies in order to survive.
 - Created with Unreal Engine 4 and C++, programmed for scalability and compatibility with UE blueprints.
 - 3D Models were created with Blender.
 - Simple AI created for challenging and diverse gameplay.

projects.title: Spells & Potions, Inc.
projects.bodyText:
A 2D action survival game where you play as a wizard-in-training. The duties a wizard must take to advance his career is to go out, slay shadow spirits, and save civilians! The player will be able to craft potions to help them fight and survive.
 - This game was made for PirateSoftwares July 2024's game jam with a team of 5 artists and developers.

projects.title: Dungeons and Dragons Character Creator
projects.bodyText:
- Manipulated the DOM using vanilla Javascript functions in order to create an interactive single page environment.
 - Utilized CSS in order to stylize an interesting and unique design.
 - Fetched data from an external API to display information that aids users to make decisions in character creation.

projects.title: Forum Application
projects.bodyText:
- ReactJS framework was used in order to create a responsive single-page application.
 - Properly using fetch requests in order to send and recieve JSON data.
 - UI frameworks such as Material UI was implemented to provide an appealing front end design.

projects.title: Event Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Full CRUD was implemented to allow users to utilize routes for manipulating event data.
 - Added validations in each form so data being created stays consistent with written constraints.
 - Developed with ReactJS and Ruby on Rails to create a full stack application.

projects.title: Roleplay Chat
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented full authentication and authorization to ensure user security.
 - Used ActionCable to create a bi-directional communication between server and client.
 - Utilized cookies to store encrypted user data to keep the user signed in when they re-visit.

projects.title: EDM Concert API
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and developed a backend API, enabling seamless integration for other developers to incorporate EDM concert data into their projects.
 - Implemented full CRUD functionality to manage a comprehensive database of EDM events.
